abstract:
The article discusses the results of research in Institutional Program
for Scientific Initiation (PIBIC) held at the Federal Rural University of
Pernambuco (UFRPE) in the course of Computer Science with the objective of
semiotic analysis of YouTube pre-commercial, those obligatory samples
commercial videos of 5 secs presented in some videos. The objective is to
identify the semiotic criteria of sound, image and text used for the attention of
users through a micro-analysis of these videos. The purpose is to further
implement such strategies in other videos created with educational goals
